articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Rahat Fateh Ali Khan released after detention by police in criminal defamation case: Report | Today News - Mint
articles.description: Famous Pakistani singer Rahat Fateh Ali Khan was released on bail after he was detained by local police in Dubai following a complaint on criminal defamation case
articles.content: Famous Pakistani singer Rahat Fateh Ali Khan was reportedly released on bail following his detention by the local police in Dubai in a criminal defamation case. The singer was detained by the local p… [+1691 chars]
